stages.name: resource_fetch
stages.source_code: return {subs: {point: point_a, category: 'econom', zone_match_radius: 100, time_delta: 10, tag: 'test_tag'}};

stages.name: use_resource
stages.source_code: const value = subventions.length ? subventions[0].time_to_start_sec : 0; const value_raw = subventions.length ? subventions[0].distance : 0; return {data: {name: 'econom', surge: {value: value}, value_raw: value_raw, calculation_meta: {counts: {pins: 10, free: 2, free_chain: 111, total: 0, radius: 0}}}};
